locales.title: payfastOrSlow
locales.content: The PayFast extension for WooCommerce enables you to accept payments by Credit Card and EFT via one of South Africaâ€™s most popular payment gateways. No setup fees or monthly subscription costs.  Selecting this extension will configure your store to use South African rands as the selected currency.

locales.title: WooCommerce Payments
locales.description: Try the new way to get paid. Securely accept credit and debit cards on your site. Manage transactions without leaving your WordPress dashboard. Only with WooCommerce Payments.
